body_html:
Sergey Ioffe mentions the following:

"There are multiple issues with that git change. It keeps maintaining the moving variance instead of standard deviation; will not work early in training due to the lack of debiasing; is inefficient because they do BN first and then correct; and finally the computation is wrong because they apply gamma and beta before the correction, but they should be applied after."

Sergey is working on a correct implementation of batch renormalization and will be pushing it soon. We will not be moving forward with this PR. Sorry about that.
